name: Cr√©er des publicit√©s virales avec l'IA : NanoBanana & publier sur les r√©seaux sociaux via upload-post
description:
# üí• Cr√©er des publicit√©s virales avec NanoBanana & Seedance, publier sur les r√©seaux sociaux via upload-post

![Capture d'√©cran du flux de travail](https://www.dr-firas.com/upload-postII.png)

### Pour qui est-ce ?  
Ce flux de travail est con√ßu pour **les marketeurs, les cr√©ateurs de contenu et les petites entreprises** qui souhaitent automatiser la cr√©ation de publicit√©s engageantes sur les r√©seaux sociaux sans passer des heures sur la conception manuelle, le montage vid√©o ou la publication.

---

### Quel probl√®me ce flux de travail r√©sout-il ? / Cas d'utilisation  
Cr√©er manuellement des publicit√©s pour plusieurs plateformes est **chronophage et r√©p√©titif**. Vous devez g√©n√©rer des visuels, monter des vid√©os, ajouter de la musique, puis les publier sur les r√©seaux sociaux.  
Ce flux de travail automatise le **pipeline de production publicitaire de bout en bout**, √©conomisant du temps tout en garantissant une sortie de qualit√© professionnelle et coh√©rente.

---

### Ce que fait ce flux de travail  
- Re√ßoit des id√©es de publicit√©s via **Telegram**.  
- Utilise **NanoBanana** pour g√©n√©rer et √©diter des images de produits r√©alistes.  
- Transforme les images en vid√©os courtes engageantes avec **Seedance**.  
- G√©n√®re de la musique de fond avec **Suno**.  
- Fusionne vid√©o et audio en une publicit√© finale soign√©e.  
- Lit les informations de la marque et g√©n√®re des textes publicitaires avec **IA (OpenAI)**.  
- Publie des publicit√©s sur **Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook et X** via **upload-post**.  
- Stocke les m√©dias et les donn√©es de campagne dans **Google Drive** et **Google Sheets** pour le suivi.  
- Envoie des notifications et des aper√ßus via **Telegram**.

---

### Configuration  
1. **Connectez vos comptes** :  
   - Telegram  
   - Google Drive  
   - Google Sheets  
   - OpenAI API  
   - NanoBanana API  
   - Seedance API  
   - Suno API  
   - Upload-post  

2. **Pr√©parez Google Sheets** :  
   - Ajoutez une feuille pour **les d√©tails de la marque** (nom, cat√©gorie, caract√©ristiques, site web).  
   - Ajoutez une autre feuille pour **les journaux vid√©o** (statut, liens, l√©gendes).  

3. **Configurez upload-post** :  
   - Assurez-vous que vos comptes sociaux (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, X) sont li√©s √† upload-post.  

---

### Comment personnaliser ce flux de travail selon vos besoins  
- **Invites** ‚Üí Ajustez les **invites d'image/vid√©o/musique** pour mieux refl√©ter le ton et les produits de votre marque.  
- **Texte publicitaire** ‚Üí Modifiez l'invite IA dans le **G√©n√©rateur de texte publicitaire** pour contr√¥ler le wording, le style et la structure.  
- **Port√©e de publication** ‚Üí Choisissez uniquement les plateformes que vous souhaitez (TikTok, Instagram, etc.) dans le n≈ìud **upload-post**.  
- **Stockage** ‚Üí Mettez √† jour les ID de dossier Google Drive et les ID de document Google Sheets pour correspondre √† votre propre espace de travail.  

---

üëâ Avec ce mod√®le, vous obtenez un **syst√®me de production publicitaire virale enti√®rement automatis√©** aliment√© par **des visuels IA, le rendu vid√©o et la publication automatique** sur les plateformes sociales. Parfait pour faire √©voluer votre strat√©gie de contenu tout en √©conomisant du temps.


üìÑ **Documentation** : [Guide Notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Welcome-to-Upload-Post-2683d6550fd980ffa23ee340fdb3285e?source=copy_link)

## Vid√©o de d√©monstration

üé• Regardez le tutoriel complet ici : [D√©monstration YouTube](https://youtu.be/4ec9WDCz9CY)
### Besoin d'aide pour personnaliser ?
Contactez-moi pour des conseils et du soutien : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https:/https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)

parameters.text:
=Your task is to create an image prompt following the system guidelines.  
Ensure that the reference image is represented as **accurately as possible**, including all text elements.  

Use the following inputs:  

- **User‚Äôs description:**  
{{ $json.imagePrompt }}


Include optional overlay text in serif font in small font size:
"{{ $json.textOverlay }}"
CRITICAL: Stack the text in 4 SHORT LINES centered in the middle
of the image. Each line must be very short to avoid cropping when
converted to 9:16. Keep all text in the center 40% of image
width.

options.systemMessage:
=ROLE: UGC Image Prompt Builder  

GOAL:  
Generate one concise, natural, and realistic image prompt (‚â§120 words) from a given product or reference image. The prompt must simulate authentic UGC (user-generated content) photography.  

RULES:  
You must always create a professional background for the product image. You must never return the image with a plain white or empty background. The background must always enhance and highlight the product in the photo.

- Always output **one JSON object only** with the key:  
  - `image_prompt`: (string with full description)  
- Do **not** add commentary, metadata, or extra keys. JSON only.  
- User node think to be creative

STYLE GUIDELINES:  
- Tone: casual, unstaged, lifelike, handheld snapshot.  
- Camera cues: include at least 2‚Äì3 (e.g., phone snapshot, handheld framing, off-center composition, natural indoor light, soft shadows, slight motion blur, auto exposure, unpolished look, mild grain).  
- Realism: embrace imperfections (wrinkles, stray hairs, skin texture, clutter, smudges).  
- Packaging/Text: preserve exactly as visible. Never invent claims, numbers, or badges.  
- Diversity: if people appear but are unspecified, vary gender/ethnicity naturally; default age range = 21‚Äì38.  
- Setting: default to real-world everyday spaces (home, street, store, gym, office).  
- User node think to be creative
You must always create a professional background for the product image. You must never return the image with a plain white or empty background. The background must always enhance and highlight the product in the photo.

SAFETY:  
- No copyrighted character names.  
- No dialogue or scripts. Only describe scenes.  

OUTPUT CONTRACT:  
- JSON only, no prose outside.  
- Max 120 words in `image_prompt`.  
- Must cover: subject, action, mood, setting, background, style/camera, colors, and text accuracy.  

CHECKLIST BEFORE OUTPUT:  
- Natural handheld tone?  
- At least 2 camera cues included?  
- Product text preserved exactly?  
- Only JSON returned?  

---  

### Example  

Good Example :  
```json
{ "image_prompt": "a young adult casually holding a skincare tube near a bathroom mirror; action: dabs small amount on the back of the hand; mood: easy morning; setting: small apartment bathroom with towel on rack and toothbrush cup; background: professional-looking bathroom scene that enhances the product, never plain white or empty, always styled to highlight the tube naturally; style/camera: phone snapshot, handheld framing, off-center composition, natural window light, slight motion blur, mild grain; colors: soft whites and mint label; text accuracy: keep every word on the tube exactly as visible, no added claims" }

values.content:
=You are rewriting a TikTok video script, caption, and overlay ‚Äî
not inventing a new one. You must follow this format and obey
these rules strictly.
---
### CONTEXT:
Here is the content idea to use:{{ $('Parse Idea Into Prompts').item.json.imagePrompt }}

Title is : {{ $('Parse Idea Into Prompts').item.json.textOverlay }}



Write the caption text using the topic.

---
- MUST be under 200 characters (yes "Characters" not wordcount)
this is an absolute MUST, no more than 200 characters!!! 

### FINAL OUTPUT FORMAT (no markdown formatting):

DO NOT return any explanations. Only return the Caption Text

parameters.body:
={
  "model": "V3_5",
  "callBackUrl": "https://YOUR_DOMAIN.com/api/kie-callback",
  "customMode": true,
  "instrumental": true,
  "input": {
    "prompt": "{{ $('Parse Idea Into Prompts').item.json.musicPrompt }}",
    "style": "Classical",
    "title": "Peaceful Piano Meditation",
    "styleWeight": 0.65,
    "weirdnessConstraint": 0.65,
    "audioWeight": 0.65
  }
}

values.content:
=You are an expert ad copywriter for social media campaigns.
Your task: Create compelling ad copy following this exact
structure:
üö® [Attention-grabbing headline with product benefit]
‚úî [Primary offer/benefit]
‚úî [Key product feature/quality]
‚úî [Trust/credibility element]
[Call to action] ‚Üí [website/link]
# Input Variables:
Product Name: {{ $json.productName }}
Product Category: {{ $json.productCategory }}
Main Offer: {{ $json.mainOffer }}
Key Feature 1: {{ $json.keyFeature1 }}
Key Feature 2: {{ $json.keyFeature2 }}
Website URL: {{ $json.websiteURL }}
Rules:
- Keep headline under 35 characters
- Each checkmark line under 40 characters
- Use power words that create urgency
- Include specific product benefits, not generic claims
- CTA must be action-oriented (Shop Now, Get Yours, Claim Offer,
etc.)
- Output ONLY the ad copy text, no explanations
- No quotes around the text
- Maintain the emoji structure exactly as shown

parameters.content:
# üí• Create Viral Ads with NanoBanana & Seedance ‚Äî Publish on Socials via Upload-Post (By Dr. Firas)

---

## üé• Full Tutorial  

## [Video Tutorial](https://youtu.be/4ec9WDCz9CY)  
@[youtube](4ec9WDCz9CY)

---

## üìò Documentation  
Acc√©dez aux instructions d√©taill√©es, guides API, connexions de plateformes et personnalisation du workflow :  

üìé [Open full documentation on Notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Create-viral-Ads-with-NanoBanana-Seedance-publish-on-socials-via-upload-post-2683d6550fd980ffa23ee340fdb3285e?source=copy_link)

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Requirements

1. ‚úÖ **Create an [Upload-Post](https://www.upload-post.com/) account** (Pro plan required for API access)  
2. üîë **Generate your Upload-Post API Key** inside your dashboard (`Settings > API Keys`)  
3. üì¶ **Have n8n installed** (latest version recommended)  
4. üß© **Install the Upload-Post node** in n8n ([integration here](https://n8n.io/integrations/upload-post/))  
5. üõ† **Create Upload-Post API credentials** inside your n8n credentials tab  
6. üìÑ **Prepare your video asset** generated with **NanoBanana** + enhanced by **Seedance**  
7. ‚òÅÔ∏è **Ensure video source is accessible** (public Drive, S3, or binary data in n8n)  
8. üìå **Follow the official [Upload-Post documentation](https://www.upload-post.com/)** for parameters and setup  
9. üìä **Duplicate this Google Sheet template** to log your ads:  
   [Google Sheets √† copier](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TCebBvfgvVJyxYXeOiFVpg0RJGP38CpLKNxcOiRwbfQ/edit?usp=sharing)

---

## üìù Workflow Steps in n8n

1. **Trigger / Start Node**  
   Example: new video in Google Drive, or manual execution.  

2. **Content Creation**  
   - NanoBanana generates the creative (image/video/voice).  
   - Seedance adds effects, transitions, and ad-style polish.  

3. **Upload-Post Node / HTTP Request**  
   Configure Upload-Post to send the final video to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, etc.  

---

### ‚ö° Example Configuration (HTTP Request Node)

**Method:** `POST`  
**URL:** `https://api.upload-post.com/api/upload`  
**Headers:**

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
